title: User Registration with Mandatory Consent
description: Verify that user registration requires email, password, and explicit data processing consent checkbox before account creation.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in valid email and password.
Attempt to register without checking the consent checkbox.
Verify registration is blocked and a user-friendly error message is displayed requiring consent.
Check the mandatory consent checkbox.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm that registration succeeds and user is redirected to the dashboard or welcome page.

title: Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that user can log in successfully using valid email and password within 10 seconds.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input valid registered email and correct password.
Click login button.
Check that login is successful and user is directed to the user dashboard within 10 seconds.

title: Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login attempt with invalid email or password fails and displays friendly error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input invalid email and/or incorrect password.
Click login button.
Verify login is rejected and user-friendly, non-technical error message is displayed.

title: PDF Upload and AI-Generated Multiple Choice Questions
description: Ensure users can upload valid PDFs and the system generates multiple choice questions appropriately.

steps.description: Log in as a registered user and navigate to the question generation module.
Upload a PDF document containing driver's license theoretical content.
Verify system parses PDF successfully and triggers AI generation of multiple choice questions.
Confirm generated questions are relevant to PDF content and stored in user-accessible study materials.

title: PDF Upload and AI-Generated Flashcards
description: Validate the generation of educational flashcards from uploaded PDFs using AI service.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the flashcard generation module.
Upload a PDF related to driver's license exam study.
Verify system extracts content and generates flashcards with front and back sides.
Confirm flashcards are linked to user profile and can be reviewed in flashcard study mode.

title: Flashcard Interaction and Local Save of Responses
description: Verify that users can interact with flashcards (flip front/back) and responses are saved locally for progress tracking.

steps.description: Access generated flashcards from user dashboard.
Flip flashcards to view both front and back sides.
Mark flashcards as known or unknown according to user response.
Verify user responses are saved locally and persist after page reload or logout/login.

title: Simulado Test with Auto-Correction and Scoring
description: Validate that users can take full simulados with automatic correction and immediate percentage score display.

steps.description: Navigate to simulados section from dashboard.
Start a new simulated exam.
Answer all multiple choice questions.
Submit the simulad.
Verify the system auto-corrects the answers and displays percentage score immediately.

title: User Progress Dashboard Updates After Module Completion
description: Ensure the user progress dashboard automatically updates statistics, study time, and revision suggestions after each study module is finished.

steps.description: Complete a study module, such as a flashcard set or a simulado.
Verify that the dashboard reflects updated performance metrics, time spent, and personalized revision advice.
Check that data is consistent across multiple sessions for the same user.

title: Responsive UI on Multiple Screen Resolutions
description: Verify that the user interface adapts properly to at least three screen resolutions including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open the platform on desktop resolution (e.g., 1920x1080).
Verify all UI elements are correctly displayed, no overflow or misalignment occurs.
Resize or access the platform on tablet resolution (e.g., 768x1024).
Confirm UI components rearrange accordingly and remain usable without horizontal scrolling.
Access the platform on mobile resolution (e.g., 375x667).
Verify responsive menu, touch-friendly controls, and consistent content rendering.

title: Stripe Payment Checkout Process
description: Ensure that payment via Stripe proceeds correctly, payment verification occurs, and user receives confirmation email.

steps.description: Select a paid plan and proceed to checkout.
Complete payment using a valid test credit card in Stripe checkout.
Verify payment is successfully processed and transaction verified by back-end.
Check that a confirmation email is sent to the user.
Attempt payment with invalid card and verify failure.
Confirm user-friendly error message is displayed and no payment is processed.

title: Marketplace Instructor Search and Filter (Planned Feature)
description: Validate that the marketplace allows searching and filtering instructors by city, vehicle type, and pricing.

steps.description: Navigate to the instructors marketplace section.
Enter search criteria such as city or region.
Apply filters for vehicle type and pricing.
Verify that the list updates to show only instructors matching selected parameters.
Select an instructor to view profile details.
Check that all relevant information including certifications, pricing, and reviews are shown.

title: Admin Panel - User Management
description: Check admin can list, search, edit, and disable user accounts appropriately.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open user management panel.
Search for specific users using filters such as email or registration date.
Verify search results are accurate and relevant.
Edit user details like role or status.
Confirm changes are saved and enforced in the system.
Disable a user account and verify access is revoked.

title: Admin Panel - Question and Flashcard Management
description: Ensure admin can create, edit, and delete multiple choice questions and flashcards.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to question management.
Create a new multiple choice question.
Confirm question is stored and visible in the list.
Edit existing questions and save changes.
Delete a question and verify it no longer appears.
Repeat above steps for flashcards in flashcard management panel.

title: User-Facing Error Messages Are Friendly and Non-Technical
description: Verify that all error messages exposed to users are clear, friendly, and avoid technical jargon.

steps.description: Trigger errors such as invalid login, PDF upload failure, payment failure.
Confirm displayed error messages are understandable, courteous, and do not expose internal details.

title: PDF Parsing Robustness and Error Handling
description: Test system behavior when uploading invalid, corrupted, or unsupported PDF files for parsing and content extraction.

steps.description: Upload a corrupted or non-PDF file where PDF expected for material population.
Verify system prevents upload and shows friendly error message.
Upload a very large PDF file to test performance limits.
Check system handles the file gracefully without crashing or freezing.
